home.name: Sachin Kumar
home.compactAbout: An experienced developer and designer dedicated to crafting innovative software solutions for businesses.

about.expandedAbout: I'm Sachin Kumar, an experienced developer and designer dedicated to crafting innovative software solutions for businesses. With a year of hands-on experience, I specialize in creating functional and visually captivating experiences tailored to your unique needs. Committed to excellence, I prioritize your satisfaction and refine my work until it exceeds your expectations. Let's collaborate to elevate your business through cutting-edge technology and design innovation. Contact me to bring your ideas to life!

skill.description: My technical skill includes proficiency in JAVA, MuleSoft, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Spring Boot. I'm also well-versed in creating APIs, AWS Cloud, and Azure DevOps.
